text: "Troublemaker" is a song by Olly Murs. He also wrote the song. It was released on October 12, 2012. The song features Flo Rida. "Troublemaker" was a major commercial success. It was a success across the United Kingdom and the United States. It also served as the closing song at Murs's 2013 arena tour. Category:2012 songs Category:Flo Rida songs Category:Pop songs Category:Soul music
title: Troublemaker (Olly Murs song)
